articles.title: With rose perfumes on trend, we test three of the best new launches
articles.author: Beauty Editor
articles.summary: Zara launched Fashionably London elixir EDP, a citrusy rose scent created by Jo Malone. Elie Saab introduced Elixir Love EDP, featuring cherry, oak moss, and patchouli. Jo Malone London released Taif Rose Cologne Intense, a smoky rose scent with amber and coffee notes. Boots offers a limited-edition Valentine's Day Beauty Box including products from Iconic London, Pixi, and NYX.

articles.title: Nokia X800 Pro: Will Present Fierce Specifications, 120Hz AMOLED Screen, 7000mAh Battery
articles.author: archyde
articles.summary: Nokia, under HMD Global, is launching the Nokia X800 Pro smartphone in 2025, emphasizing durability, innovation, and user-centric design. The X800 Pro features a next-generation camera system, a fast processor, remarkable battery life, and innovative features designed to enhance the user experience.

articles.title: Oppo Reno 15 Pro battery
articles.author: Bhupendra Singh Chundawat
articles.summary: Oppo launched its latest 5G flagship smartphone. This represents a new product introduction by the company.

articles.title: Oppo Reno 15 Pro vs competitors
articles.author: Bhupendra Singh Chundawat
articles.summary: Oppo launched its latest 5G flagship smartphone, representing a new product introduction from the company.

articles.title: Oppo Reno 15 Pro price
articles.author: Bhupendra Singh Chundawat
articles.summary: Oppo launched its latest 5G flagship smartphone, representing a new advancement in its product line.

articles.title: Oppo Reno 15 Pro camera
articles.author: Bhupendra Singh Chundawat
articles.summary: Oppo launched its latest 5G flagship smartphone.

articles.title: Oppo Reno 15 Pro features
articles.author: Bhupendra Singh Chundawat
articles.summary: Oppo launched its latest 5G flagship smartphone. This new product aims to innovate in the smartphone market.

articles.title: Oppo Reno 15 Pro 5G
articles.author: Bhupendra Singh Chundawat
articles.summary: Oppo launched its latest 5G flagship smartphone, signaling a new product introduction by the company. This new release raises the bar in smartphone innovation.

articles.title: Oppo Reno 15 Pro Snapdragon processor
articles.author: Bhupendra Singh Chundawat
articles.summary: Oppo launched its latest 5G flagship smartphone. This new product aims to raise the bar in smartphone innovation.

articles.title: 'Naked' Costco Lobsters: Convenient Or Creepy?
articles.author: Creshonda A. Smith
articles.summary: Costco is now selling "naked lobsters," which are whole lobsters with the shells already removed. This product offers convenience and ease of use for those who love lobster but dislike the effort of cracking shells. It allows for quick preparation of dishes like lobster pasta and mac and cheese.

articles.title: It's never too early to send flowers! Get up to 50% off Valentine's Day roses, orchids and more
articles.author: Kasey Caminiti
articles.summary: 1-800-Flowers is offering up to 50% off select floral arrangements as part of their Valentine's Day promotion. They also provide same-day delivery options and feature a special Disney vase with roses for Valentine's Day 2025.

articles.title: It's not too late to send flowers! Get up to 50% off Valentine's Day roses, orchids and more
articles.author: Kasey Caminiti
articles.summary: 1-800-Flowers is offering up to 50% off select floral arrangements for Valentine's Day, including roses, lilies, and mixed bouquets. They provide same-day delivery options, ensuring timely arrival through a network of local florists and carriers like FedEx, UPS, and USPS, with various delivery schedules available.

articles.title: The five best-selling small SUVs of 2024
articles.author: Josh Nevett
articles.summary: MG launched a new hybrid ZS in November, inheriting its system from the MG 3, with petrol versions joining in February. Hyundai offers a new-for-2025 Kona Electric N Line Premium Extended Range.  Mitsubishi will replace the ASX during 2025 with a rebadged Renault Captur.

articles.title: Marks & Spencer's new £30 'ultra-flattering' winter mini dress that's 'ideal for work and nights out'
articles.author: Zoe Chamberlain
articles.summary: Marks & Spencer (M&S) introduced a new mini dress as part of their winter wardrobe collection. The dress, available in sizes 6-24 and petite, regular, and tall lengths, is made from a viscose, polyester, and elastane mix. It features a round neck, long sleeves, a mini-length hem, and a bow detail.

articles.title: What Is Galaxy Gas? Here Is A Dangerous Trend Among Young People
articles.author: The Feed
articles.summary: Galaxy Gas, a Georgia-based vendor, markets nitrous oxide-filled cartridges for creating whipped cream, available in flavors like 'Strawberry Cream' and 'Watermelon Lemonade'. These cartridges are sold on online platforms like Amazon, eBay, and Walmart. However, the product is being misused as a recreational drug.

articles.title: Three pre-mixed cocktails from Amazon to impress (or save) your Valentine's night
articles.author: Head
articles.summary: NIO Cocktails offers pre-made classic cocktails in letterbox-friendly pouches and is working towards carbon neutrality. MOTH Cocktails provides bar-strength cocktails in recyclable cans. SERVED Cocktails offers lighter, fruit-based cocktails made with upcycled fruit. All three are available on Amazon.

articles.title: 36 Products You'll Look At And Decide "You Can Be My Valentine This Year"
articles.author: Heather Braga
articles.summary: The article features a selection of products available on Amazon and Urban Outfitters, including the "Soft" perfume rollerball, a facial steamer, a hummingbird lamp, wineglasses, crossbody bags, candle warmers, Otherland candles, iPhone screen protectors, ceramic book vases from Chronicle Books' Bibliophile collection, Squishmallows, Samiah Luxe chenille blanket, Lego roses, Sol De Janeiro Brazilian Bum Bum Cream, dainty hoop earrings, a French tart baking kit from Cooking Gift Set, a tulip-shaped tea infuser, a bow-shaped resin night-light, BrüMate Era tumbler, a Cozy Spaces-themed coloring book from Coco Wyo, Kunitsa Co.'s book lover's journal, a triangular book page holder from Besuerte Store, Clinique Almost Lipstick Tinted Lip Balm in Black Honey, a layered necklace set, a mason jar cold brew maker from County Line Kitchen, a coffee syrup dispenser set from New England Stories, a Folklore –inspired cup cardigan from TTcraftersdepartment, a bear–covered mug, a JW Pei faux-suede bag, a Simple Retro Fair Isle crewneck sweater, a Sonic The Hedgehog device stand, a "Sweet Tooth" perfume by Sabrina Carpenter, a Cup Cozy Pillow, squishy animal-themed gel pens, Ouai Repair and Restore Treatment Masque and a 13-inch chocolate chip cookie cake from Eat Me Cookies. These span beauty, home goods, and novelty items.

articles.title: OpenAI's AI Agent Has to Be Monitored Nonstop to Catch Its Constant Screwups
articles.summary: OpenAI has launched "Operator," a new AI agent designed to perform digital tasks like online grocery shopping, available to ChatGPT Pro subscribers for $200/month. The AI agent, however, is in an early stage and requires significant user supervision, struggling with complex tasks and needing confirmation before completing important actions.

articles.title: We finally have a name for Samsung's teased tri-fold phone
articles.author: Patrick Hearn
articles.summary: Samsung is rumored to be releasing the Galaxy G Fold, a tri-fold phone, potentially in late 2025 or January 2026. The device is expected to be 9.96 inches wide and 6.54 inches high, featuring a double-folding design. Pricing could exceed $2,000.

articles.title: AI war enters next battle: After OpenAI, now Oracle launches AI agents; here's all about what it can do
articles.author: The Feed
articles.summary: Oracle has introduced new AI agents designed to enhance business operations, improve efficiency, and reduce costs by automating tasks and streamlining decision-making. These agents aim to improve customer interactions through personalized, real-time support, redefining how businesses handle customer support.

articles.title: Lidl's Hyaluronic Acid Face Cream: Shockingly Good, Ridiculously Cheap
articles.author: archyde
articles.summary: Lidl has launched a new vegan-friendly skincare line called Cien Cell Intense, featuring a day cream, night cream, and serum, all containing hyaluronic acid. The range is designed for all skin types, promising deep hydration and anti-aging benefits, and is priced affordably to challenge luxury brands.

articles.title: NYT Mini Crossword today: Clues and answers for Saturday, February 1, 2025
articles.author: The Feed
articles.summary: Several courses and programs are being offered. These include 'AI-Powered Python Mastery with Tabnine', 'Mastering Microsoft Office', and 'Financial Literacy i.e Lets Crack the Billionaire Code', amongst others.  These courses are provided by companies like elearnmarkets and individuals like Seth Godin, Pam Moore and others.

articles.title: Coca-Cola announces unusual flavor and the novelty sparks controversy on social media
articles.author: TB Costa
articles.summary: Coca-Cola will launch Coca-Cola Orange Cream, featuring a refreshing orange infusion with smooth, creamy vanilla flavors, on February 10 in the USA and Canada. A Zero Sugar version of the drink will also be available. The company is promoting the launch with an ad campaign and a countdown clock on its website.

articles.title: Royal Caribbean fixes a terrible part of the cruising experience
articles.author: Matthew Frankel
articles.summary: Royal Caribbean introduced an AI-powered in-app chatbot to improve guest experience and reduce customer service line wait times. The chatbot, initially tested on Wonder of the Seas and expanded to Icon of the Seas, saw a 35% increase in guest adoption, leading to a 20% reduction in the customer service line. The chatbot addresses common guest inquiries and tasks, like Wi-Fi troubleshooting and drink package questions.

articles.title: AI war enters next battle: After OpenAI, now Oracle launches AI agents; here's all about what it can do
articles.summary: Oracle has introduced its new AI agents, designed to enhance business operations, improve efficiency, and reduce costs. These agents automate tasks, streamline decision-making, and improve customer interactions through personalized, real-time support. This launch aims to provide customized, scalable solutions in the competitive AI market.

articles.title: 12 Nutella Alternatives, Ranked Worst To Best
articles.author: Amber Winston
articles.summary: The article reviews 12 Nutella alternatives, ranking them from worst to best. These include Gooey Hazelnut Cocoa Spread, Amazon Fresh Hazelnut Spread, Justin's Chocolate Hazelnut and Almond Butter, Nutlicious Hazelnut Mocha Spread, 365 by Whole Foods Market Organic Hazelnut Cocoa Spread, Good & Gather Hazelnut Spread with Cocoa, Nucolato Vegan Hazelnut Spread, Artisana Organics Hazelnut Cacao Spread, Bonne Maman Hazelnut Chocolate Spread, Peanut Butter & Co Milk Chocolatey Hazelnut Spread, Barely Hazelnut & Cocoa Spread and Great Value Hazelnut Spread. The review compares taste, texture, price, and nutritional information.

articles.title: Keep washing machine clean with 50p liquid that should be used 'once a month'
articles.author: Almha Murphy
articles.summary: Amica, a homeware supply company, advises using vinegar to clean washing machines. They recommend running a hot cycle with a cup of vinegar monthly to prevent soap scum buildup and cleaning the door seal with a vinegar and water solution regularly. This extends the washing machines lifespan.

articles.title: 'A girl in Pilates stopped to ask for my perfume– it's these £5 laundry scent boosters'
articles.author: Zoe Cripps
articles.summary: Fairy Non-Bio In-Wash Scent Booster, fragranced with almond milk and manuka honey, is being used in every wash which makes clothes smell fresh. Bold's Cold Wash Washing Liquid Gel is being used in combination with the scent booster, which makes the clothes smell amazing after wash. Six packs of Fairy Non-Bio In-Wash Scent Booster is available on Amazon for £15.67.

articles.title: 5 reasons the Galaxy S25 Ultra is a perfect fit for Android users who want to switch to Samsung
articles.author: Jon Gilbert
articles.summary: Samsung is launching the Galaxy S25 Ultra, featuring OneUI 7 with customizable features and AI tools powered by the Snapdragon 8 Elite chipset. The phone has a more comfortable design with rounded corners, Gorilla Glass Armor 2, and boasts an upgraded screen, making it a good choice for users seeking a durable and feature-rich Android experience.

articles.title: 'Lovely' £30 M&S dressing gown 'like wearing an electric blanket'
articles.author: Amber O'Connor Money
articles.summary: M&S is promoting its popular Fleece Hooded Dressing Gown, priced at £29.50, from the M&S Collection. This dressing gown boasts over 1,000 five-star reviews and an average rating of 4.6 out of 5. M&S also offers other dressing gowns like Fleece Full-Zip Dressing Gown, Fleece Heart Print Dressing Gown, Pure Cotton Jersey Waffle Dressing Gown, Teddy Borg Wrap Lounge Cardigan, and Fleece Strawberry Print Dressing Gown.

articles.title: 'Lovely' £30 M&S dressing gown 'keeps you warm' and feels 'like teddy bear hug'
articles.author: Amber O'Connor
articles.summary: Marks and Spencer's (M&S) 'Fleece Hooded Dressing Gown' is receiving positive customer feedback, with over 1,000 five-star ratings. The dressing gown, priced at £29.50, is part of the M&S Collection and is available in multiple colors and sizes, though some are currently sold out. M&S also offers other dressing gowns like Fleece Full-Zip Dressing Gown and Fleece Heart Print Dressing Gown.

articles.title: World's first AI-designed, 3D-printed shoe wants to be the next Crocs
articles.author: Kurt Knutsson
articles.summary: Syntilay, a startup, has launched the world's first entirely AI-designed and 3D-printed shoe. The design process utilizes Midjourney AI, Vizcom AI, and generative AI to create unique patterns and textures. Syntilay claims AI designing shoes dramatically reduces the time to market for new releases, from 18 months to a few months.

articles.title: I just saw Adobe Project Concept in action, and it's the best use case for gen AI yet
articles.author: Joe Foley
articles.summary: Adobe is introducing Project Concept, a browser-based mood-boarding tool that utilizes AI to streamline the creative process. The tool allows users to combine original assets, Adobe Content, and AI-generated images to create mood boards, and it integrates with other Adobe apps like Photoshop. Users can currently sign up for a waiting list to try the private beta version.

articles.title: Nokia X50: AMOLED, Snapdragon 7 Series, and Long Battery Life
articles.author: archyde
articles.summary: Nokia has launched the Nokia X50, a mid-range smartphone featuring a 6.7-inch AMOLED display, Snapdragon 7 series chipset, 64MP camera with AI features, and a 5,000 mAh battery. The phone runs on stock Android and is designed to offer a balance of premium features and affordability.

articles.title: Inside Lidl's £410,000 supermarket pub plans as shoppers predict 'carnage'
articles.author: Courtney Pochin
articles.summary: Lidl is opening its first in-store pub in Dundonald, near Belfast. The pub will be located on the left side of the existing supermarket and include a main bar, seating areas, an 'off-sales' area, and customer facilities. Plans also reveal the pub will have an entrance leading to the car park.

articles.title: Danish chain expanding in Portugal
articles.summary: JYSK plans to open more than 30 new stores in Portugal and Spain during the 2024-2025 fiscal year. Openings are scheduled for Ovar, Sintra, and Vila Nova de Gaia in the first months of 2025. JYSK expects to create 400 new jobs while investing in team development.

articles.title: Ninja's double air-fryer drops to cheapest ever price with special deal stack
articles.author: Lucy Addicott
articles.summary: Ninja is offering its Double Stack Air-Fryer at a discounted price of £199.99 on its website, further reducible with a newsletter sign-up and TopCashback bonus. The air fryer has a 9.5-liter capacity, with two stacked drawers and six cooking functions, plus accessories.

articles.title: I'm Genuinely Curious Which Of These Unhinged Cookie Flavors You'd Rather Eat
articles.author: Aaron Hirsch
articles.summary: BuzzFeed has launched a new AI-enhanced quiz where users can explore a range of unusual and AI-generated cookie flavors. The quiz allows users to compare results and suggest even weirder flavor combinations. This represents a new interactive service offering from BuzzFeed.

articles.title: How Helpful Is Operator, OpenAI's New A.I. Agent?
articles.author: Kevin Roose
articles.summary: OpenAI released 'Operator,' a new AI agent available to ChatGPT Pro subscribers. This tool can use a web browser, fill out forms, and take actions on a user's behalf. Operator aims to carry out tasks autonomously, such as placing orders, but currently has limitations and requires user supervision.

articles.title: Clean washing machines with £1.09 item that leaves drums sparkling
articles.author: Almha Murphy
articles.summary: Amica recommends using vinegar to clean washing machines, suggesting a monthly hot cycle with a cup of vinegar in the empty drum to prevent soap scum buildup. They also advise wiping down the door seal with a vinegar and water solution and soaking the detergent drawer in vinegar to prolong the machine's lifespan, thus presenting vinegar as a budget-friendly washing machine cleaning 'service'.

articles.title: Asus Zenfone 9 Price Drops, Flagship Smartphone with Snapdragon 8+ Gen 1
articles.author: archyde
articles.summary: ASUS launched the Zenfone 9, a flagship smartphone in 2022 featuring the Qualcomm Snapdragon 8+ Gen 1 chipset, Octa-core CPUs, and Adreno 730 GPU. Users can choose between 8GB or 16GB of LPDDR5 memory and 128GB or 256GB of UFS 3.1 internal storage. It runs on Android 12 and includes features like a fingerprint sensor and Ozo audio noise reduction technology.

articles.title: I found the 'best alternatives' to Warburtons bread, Lurpak butter and Heinz soup, beans and ketchup
articles.author: Zoe Chamberlain
articles.summary: The content discusses taste tests and comparisons of name-brand products like Heinz Tomato Soup, Lurpak Butter, Warburtons Bread, Heinz Baked Beans and Heinz Ketchup with cheaper alternatives from Aldi, Lidl and Morrisons. The analysis includes price comparisons and taste assessments, revealing that some budget options offer similar or better quality at a lower cost, such as Morrisons soup, Lidl bread and butter, Aldi baked beans, and M&S ketchup.

articles.title: Dongfeng Nammi Box EV: More than just its 'bubble gum' looks
articles.author: Marc Anthony Reyes
articles.summary: Dongfeng has launched the Nammi Box EV, a sub-compact, hatchback electric vehicle targeted towards young women. The Nammi Box EV features a 12-inch infotainment touchscreen and offers smooth drive experience. The EV's motor automatically starts and stops by unlocking and locking the key fob, respectively.

articles.title: Proton powers up in Brunei
articles.summary: Proton Brunei launched the all-new Proton X70 2025, a sports utility vehicle featuring a refined design, improved responsiveness, enhanced connectivity, and advanced technology. The X70 2025 includes features like full LED headlamps, power tailgate, a Geely Smart Ecosystem infotainment system, and Advanced Driver Assist Systems in premium variants. All variants are powered by a 1.8-litre turbocharged engine.

articles.title: We might finally have a name for Samsung's triple-screen foldable
articles.author: archyde
articles.summary: Samsung is developing the Galaxy G Fold, a tri-folding smartphone with a 9.96-inch display that folds inward for enhanced durability. Expected to launch as early as Q3 2025, this device targets early adopters with its innovative design and features, aiming to set Samsung apart from competitors in the rapidly evolving foldable market.

articles.title: Glow up and dress to impress this Valentine's Day
articles.summary: Kay Kay launched an exclusive Valentine's Capsule Collection. Type Beauty introduced the Hydra Jelly Tint - Glitter. Blur India offers Honey Lip Oil in five colors and pocket perfumes to enhance the Valentine's Day experience.

articles.title: TECNO Teases POVA's Delta Shape Star of Light in the Galaxy!
articles.author: archyde
articles.summary: TECNO is preparing to launch the next iteration of its POVA series, a smartphone known for powerful performance, impressive battery life, and sleek design at an accessible price. The new POVA features advancements in camera technology with upgraded sensor size and lens technology, boosted processing power, and innovative software features enhancing user experience. It also has a larger battery capacity and software optimizations for extended usage.

articles.title: Dehumidifier that 'really is as good as people say it is' sees 47% Debenhams price cut
articles.author: Charlotte Smith
articles.summary: Debenhams and B&Q offer a dehumidifier equipped with a compressor that extracts up to 20 liters of moisture daily. This dehumidifier includes features like laundry mode for faster drying, auto shut-off, a humidity sensor, timer settings, and a sleep display. Customers have reported effective dampness and condensation removal, with many rating the product highly.

articles.title: Kia Syros Compact SUV Launched in India at INR 8.99 Lakh; Check Design, Specifications, Features, Delivery Details and More
articles.author: Kalpeshkumar Patelia
articles.summary: Kia Automobiles has officially launched the Kia Syros, a sub-4 metre SUV, in India, with bookings having started in January 2025. The car is available in multiple variants and colour options, with ex-showroom price starting at INR 8,99,900. It will be offered in two engine options 1.0-litre turbo-petrol and 1.5-litre diesel engine.

articles.title: AI in Advertising: How Nike and Coca-Cola Are Redefining Marketing with Artificial Intelligence
articles.author: Cenk Demircan
articles.summary: Nike employs AI to create personalized advertisements and enhance virtual shopping experiences. Coca-Cola utilizes AI to generate innovative visuals and tailor messaging to different demographics. Both companies have reduced production times and expenses through AI-driven content creation, resulting in more efficient and innovative marketing campaigns.

articles.title: India Gate Basmati debuts new avatar for the modern consumer
articles.author: Afaqs
articles.summary: KRBL Limited, parent to India Gate Basmati Rice, launched redesigned packaging to improve consumer engagement and transparency. The launch on January 29, 2025, at PVR Director's Cut, Vasant Kunj, was supported by a 360-degree marketing campaign including digital, on-ground, influencer, and in-cinema activations. Bollywood legend Amitabh Bachchan and other influencers introduced the new design on social media.

articles.title: Dyson Releases Car+Boat Handheld Vacuum For Car Enthusiasts
articles.author: Ben McKimm
articles.summary: Dyson launched the Car+Boat handheld vacuum cleaner (AUD$449) designed for car and boat enthusiasts. The rechargeable, lightweight unit features a motor that spins at up to 110,000 rpm, a battery lasting up to 50 minutes, and a fully-sealed filtration system. It includes three attachments for versatile cleaning.

articles.title: OpenAI launches o3-mini, its latest reasoning model that it says is largely on par with o1 and o1-mini in capability, but runs faster and costs less (Kyle Wiggers/TechCrunch)
articles.author: Techmeme
articles.summary: OpenAI launched o3-mini, a new AI reasoning model. The model is comparable to o1 and o1-mini in capability but runs faster and costs less. The o3-mini is the newest in OpenAI's o family of reasoning models.

articles.title: The OnePlus Open 2 might have a feature most flagship smartphones don't have
articles.author: Latestnigeriannews
articles.summary: OnePlus is expected to launch the OnePlus Open 2, a foldable smartphone, later this year. The phone's camera is expected to have an impressive feature distinguishing it from other phones.

articles.title: 25 Target Beauty Products So Good, You'd Be Crushed If They Ever Get Discontinued
articles.author: Julia Lynn Rubin
articles.summary: The article highlights several newly available or noteworthy beauty and personal care products, including Honest Beauty hydrogel moisturizer, Odele clarifying shampoo, Stila liquid eyeliner, Tula face cleanser, Colourpop eyeshadow palette, Benefit mascara, and Sun Bum SPF 50 sunscreen. These products are praised for their features such as hydration, clarifying properties, long-lasting wear, and sun protection.

articles.title: How Paul Shaburov Is Using AI to Transform E-Commerce and Digital Media with GlamAI
articles.summary: GlamAI is offering AI Virtual Try-On technology, enabling consumers to visualize products like makeup and fashion items on themselves before purchase. This technology aims to improve the online shopping experience, leading to higher conversion rates. GlamAI is making this advanced technology accessible to emerging brands, influencers, and independent creators.

articles.title: OpenAI's AI Agent Has to Be Monitored Nonstop to Catch Its Constant Screwups
articles.author: Futurism
articles.summary: OpenAI has launched "Operator," its AI agent designed to automate digital tasks. The AI agent is described as needing "a lot of adult supervision."

articles.title: AI war enters next battle: After OpenAI, now Oracle launches AI agents; here's all about what it can do
articles.author: The Times
articles.summary: Oracle launched new AI agents. This introduction marks a new development for the company.

articles.title: $2000 Nvidia Geforce RTX 5090 gets tested on creative software and AI and obliterates absolutely ...
articles.author: Tech Radar
articles.summary: Puget Systems tested the new Nvidia Geforce RTX 5090, priced at $2000. The RTX 5090 outperformed its competition in creative software and AI applications.
